name: Tiffany Tantrum
description:
You are invited to Jimmy's birthday party ... but you HATE Jimmy!

Run around (with WASD/Arrows and Space) and destro everything on your path (interact with the E key) to cause as much CHAOS as possible before your parents get you!

Programming: Kainaris Alzabaar

Sprites: Sokushageta

Audio: ShadowOmega20

Music credits:

Run Amok - by Kevin MacLeod

Funny Background Music - by fesliyanstudios

Winner Winner - by Kevin MacLeod

Jaunty Gumption - by Kevin MacLeod
